    • Method Detail

      • setHue

        rx.Observable<StatusResponse> setHue(int hue,
                                     float duration)
        Sets the hue of the selected lights.
        Parameters:
        hue - the hue to set; an int between 0 and 360.
        duration - the duration to set the hue for.
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.

      • setSaturation

        rx.Observable<StatusResponse> setSaturation(int saturation,
                                            float duration)
        Sets the saturation of the selected lights.
        Parameters:
        saturation - the saturation to set; an int between 0 and 100.
        duration - the duration to set the saturation for.
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.

      • setBrightness

        rx.Observable<StatusResponse> setBrightness(int brightness,
                                            float duration)
        Sets the brightness of the selected lights.
        Parameters:
        brightness - the brightness to set; an int between 0 and 100.
        duration - the duration to set the brightness for.
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.

      • setKelvin

        rx.Observable<StatusResponse> setKelvin(int kelvin,
                                        float duration)
        Sets the kelvin (warmth) of the selected lights.
        Parameters:
        kelvin - the kelvin to set; an int between 2500 and 9000.
        duration - the duration to set the kelvin for.
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.

      • togglePower

        rx.Observable<StatusResponse> togglePower()
        Toggles the power of the selected lights
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.

      • setPower

        rx.Observable<StatusResponse> setPower(LightControl.Power power,
                                       float duration)
        Sets the power of the selected lights.
        Parameters:
        power - ON or OFF.
        duration - how long to set the power change for.
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.

      • fetchLights

        rx.Observable<Light> fetchLights(boolean fetchFromServer)
        Fetch all the Lights from the network.
        Parameters:
        fetchFromServer - whether to fetch the information from the server or to use the cached information if we have it.
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.

      • fetchLight

        rx.Observable<Light> fetchLight(java.lang.String id)
        Fetches the light with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - a String representing the id of the Light to fetch.
        Returns:
        the Observable to subscribe to.
